messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the condition of the subbasements of the antiques shop?
a death trap
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What will happen to the shop if Wick's secret is discovered and exposure is threatened?
will be gutted by fire and the basements collapsed
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What should the Keeper be flexible about in delivering the written scenario?
the actions of their players
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is mentioned as a possible highlight of a game session?
unscripted incidents
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why did the Keeper want to visit the Hobbhouse Manse?
The Keeper didn’t want to diminish the tension that had built up when the players realized the location was a red herring.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the outcome of Dr. Wheatcroft's Sanity roll?
Dr. Wheatcroft failed his Sanity roll and fainted.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the situation with the investigators and the gangsters?
The investigators told the gangsters that Leiter was in the morgue and agreed to ride back with the gangsters to show them.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happened to Shaunassy during the confrontation?
The corpse took the opportunity to grab (and break) Shaunassy’s wrist.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is responsible for the Leiter case?
Detective Lt. Bill Somerset
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the cause of death according to Detective Somerset?
A heart attack
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What will Detective Somerset say if investigators ask about the unusual circumstances of the case?
That he has easier cases to solve and no time for chasing up freakish ones
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happened to Dr. Wheatcroft during the fight?
He failed his Sanity roll and fainted
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What caused Leiter's death?
a heart attack
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How might Somerset react if investigators push him too far?
he may take an interest in them, perhaps putting a tail on them or looking into their business dealings
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can make Somerset's attitude towards a case change?
if the investigators give Somerset a hard time or push him too far
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How might Somerset react if he feels someone needs teaching a lesson in respect for law?
he is not beyond using his extensive resources to make life difficult for them
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the nature of the documents in the Hobbhouse Arkham Witch Trial Papers?
The documents are hand-written and date back to the early seventeen-hundreds, comprising a record of personal correspondence.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many pages are in the Hobbhouse Arkham Witch Trial Papers?
The Hobbhouse Arkham Witch Trial Papers contain a sheaf of some sixty unbound pages.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the binding of the Hobbhouse Arkham Witch Trial Papers?
The Hobbhouse Arkham Witch Trial Papers are closed with academic satchel-straps.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the estimated time period when the Hobbhouse Arkham Witch Trial Papers were created?
The documents date back to the early seventeen-hundreds.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the subject of the Hobbhouse Arkham Witch Trial Papers?
The Hobbhouse Arkham Witch Trial Papers are a record of personal correspondence between Caleb Hobbhouse and notable legal and spiritual authorities in colonial New England.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the physical format of the Hobbhouse Arkham Witch Trial Papers?
The Hobbhouse Arkham Witch Trial Papers are a leather folio containing a sheaf of sixty unbound pages.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When do the letters in the Hobbhouse Arkham Witch Trial Papers date back to?
The letters in the Hobbhouse Arkham Witch Trial Papers date back to the early seventeen-hundreds.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the focus of the letters in the Hobbhouse Arkham Witch Trial Papers?
The letters in the Hobbhouse Arkham Witch Trial Papers focus upon the 1690s Arkham Witch Trials.
